QuestData.Title: Missed Me By... That Much!
QuestData.Description: Listen, $gpal:toots;.$b$bI sent out a coupla supply drones from the gunship, and they've all been lost or crashed. Almost all, that is.$b$bOne of 'em buzzed right through the camp here and crashed out by them waterfalls.$b$bHow 'bout you see what you can do about bringin' the contents of that crate back here, hmm?$b$bWe're all outta drones, but my rocket boots might get come in handy... or footy, as the case may be.$b$bHah! I just kill me...
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the missing supply crate at Serenity Falls.
